searchList.name: LittleWigs
searchList.description: BigWigs plugin providing boss warnings for dungeons & scenarios. The efficiently coded alternative to Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) for spell & ability timers.

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM)
searchList.description: Displays timers and warnings of raid bosses spells and abilities and detailed Infoframes of fight mechanics.

searchList.name: BigWigs Bossmods
searchList.description: Modular, lightweight, non-intrusive approach to boss encounter warnings. The efficiently coded alternative to Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) for spell & ability timers.

searchList.name: Capping Battleground Timers
searchList.description: Battleground timers and other PvP & arena features. The efficiently coded alternative to Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) PvP.

searchList.name: DBM-RaidTools (Deadly Boss Mods)
searchList.description: Provides a lot of functions to Track Raids in EQDKP, provides a BidBot for Raid Management and many more nice features

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Cataclysm mods
searchList.description: Boss Mods for all Cataclysm Dungeons

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Legion
searchList.description: DBM modules for Legion content

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Overwatch Countdown Pack
searchList.description: A collection of overwatch countdown sound options for use with Deadly Boss Mods.

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Korean Gamers Countdown Pack
searchList.description: A collection of countdown voices from several Korean voicepacks

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Warlords of Draenor (WoD) mods
searchList.description: DBM modules for Warlords of Draenor content

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Mists of Pandaria (MoP) mods
searchList.description: DBM modules for Mists of Pandaria content

searchList.name: Dey fightin
searchList.description: Will play a sound file when you get a autoresponse from Deadly Boss Mods.

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Heroes of the Storm (HoTS) Countdown Pack
searchList.description: A collection of Heroes of the Storm countdown sound options for use with Deadly Boss Mods.

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) Event Pack
searchList.description: Several media files for DBM encounter Event feature.

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) SmoothMcGroove Event Pack
searchList.description: Several media files for DBM encounter Event feature.

searchList.name: DBM-SpellTimers (Deadly Boss Mods)
searchList.description: DBM-SpellTimers (Deadly Boss Mods)

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - BC & Vanilla/Classic mods
searchList.description: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - BC & Vanilla/Classic mods

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - Wrath of the Lich King mods
searchList.description: DBM modules for WotLK dungeons/raids

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM): Challenges
searchList.description: This mod will add support for singe player challenges such as Proving Grounds $ Legion Mage Tower to DBM

searchList.name: DBM: Timeless Isle
searchList.description: This mod adds support for Timeless Isle to Deadly Boss Mods (DBM).

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods (DBM) - PvP Mods
searchList.description: Deadly Boss Mods for Battlegrounds and Arenas

searchList.name: BigWigs_AutoReply2
searchList.description: 3rd party module for BigWigs that replicates the auto reply functionality found in Deadly Boss Mods.

searchList.name: DBM-Battlefield Barrens
searchList.description: A Deadly Boss Mods sub mod for the Battlefield: Barrens world event.

searchList.name: Deadly Boss Mods - LibDataBroker
searchList.description: Deadly Boss Mods - LibDataBroker
